name: Manga Face Generator
description:
Tool for the Tool JAM : https://itch.io/jam/the-tool-jam 

A little tool to generate Manga faces developed with Godot and C# .

All the drawings are with 2D shapes.

You can change the different settings of the face, eyes and hair to get a personalized face.

The tool is still under development, some of the features still missing:

  • Solve some issues to fill the surfaces
  • Edit nose 
  • Edit mouth + Teeth
  • Record some face animation
  • Export PNG files and othe image formats
